meanings.definition: A container typically made of woven materials, used for carrying or storing items.
meanings.sent1: She carried the fruits in the baskets.
meanings.sent2: The picnic basket was filled with sandwiches and drinks.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten jumped into the basket and played hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spilled out of her like a basket of colorful confetti.
meanings.sent5: The woven basket creaked under the weight of the books.

meanings.definition: The act of scoring a goal in basketball by throwing the ball through the hoop.
meanings.sent1: He made a perfect shot and scored two baskets.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered as the player made a three-point basket.
meanings.sent3: The basketball team celebrated each basket with high-fives and smiles.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like shooting baskets in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball swishing through the basket echoed in the gym.
